      ResourceProvisioner Host.getRamProvisioner()
      Gets the ram provisioner with capacity in Megabytes.

    • Uses of ResourceProvisioner in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners that implement ResourceProvisioner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractResourceProvisioner
      An abstract class that implements the basic features of a provisioning policy used by a host to allocate a given resource to virtual machines inside it.
      class  ResourceProvisionerSimple
      ResourceProvisionerSimple is an extension of AbstractResourceProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate a resource to VMs: if there is available amount of the resource on the host, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
      Fields in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners declared as ResourceProvisioner 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ResourceProvisioner ResourceProvisioner.NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for ResourceProvisioner<long> objects.
